text: Point to which body part on the diagram
How did the injury happen? (e.g., fall, collision, lifting, etc.)
Was it sudden or gradual ?
What symptoms did you experience right after the injury? (e.g., pain, swelling, bruising, etc.)
Did you hear or feel a pop or snap at the time of the injury
On a scale of 0-10, how would you rate your pain? Some scale
Is the pain sharp, dull, throbbing, or burning?
Is the pain constant or does it come and go?
What activities or movements increase or decrease the pain?
Are you able to move the injured area?
Has the strength of the area decreased?
Have you applied any home treatments (e.g., ice, heat, rest, over-the-counter painkillers)?
Have you seen another doctor or healthcare provider for this injury? If yes, what treatments were recommended?
Have you had a similar injury before?
Any surgeries in the affected area?
Any other health issues?
What medications are you currently taking?
Do you have any known allergies, particularly to medications?
What is your level of physical activity? What sport do you play if you do participate in them? Did you get injured while playing it?
Do you smoke, drink alcohol or do drugs? If so, how much and how often?
what do you hope to achieve from this consultation and treatment?
How fast do you need it?
